text: Two persons, who helped in flesh trade in the city, were detained under the Goondas Act. Recently, the police arrested a couple and rescued a woman who was forced into flesh trade. Inquiries revealed that R. Chandrasekaran (55) of Ponammapet and M. Saleem alias Sanaulla (42) of Mulvadi Gate were also part of the gang in operating the trade. City Police Commissioner Sumit Sharan ordered their detention under the Act.
title: Two detained under Goondas Act
